question: [Study] Turkce: Sutun grafiginden which category has the highest bar bildir.

qas.question: [Study] Turkce: Sutun grafiginden which category has the highest bar bildir.
[Note] English: Tell which category has the lowest bar from the bar chart.
[Check] Portugues: Apresente what is the difference between the tallest and shortest bars do grafico de barras.
